description.raw:
## Try it out

From the root of the `ign-gazebo` directory, run:

`ign-gazebo -v 4 -f test/worlds/mesh.sdf`

It needs to be run from the root so that the mesh's relative path is correct.

![ducks.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/389605541-ducks.gif)

## Rendering

Since rendering right now is only used in the GUI, and outside of the ECS, all it needed was the mesh information on the scene message.

It needs [this PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/181/gz11-dont-override-mesh-material/diff) for collada materials to show up.

And [this PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/126/prevent-crash-for-invalid-mesh/diff) prevents crashes for invalid meshes.

## Physics

Physics is the only consumer of mesh information from the ECS right now, so I'm just loading the mesh in the physics system as a placeholder, building on top of @scpeters's changes.

### Issues

* Mesh seems to be correctly created, but the ducks don't collide with the ground plane. I'll debug more tomorrow with the help of @azeey.

## TODOs

* Load mesh outside of physics so that it can be propagated to other systems via a component
* Use `ign-fuel-tools` to load meshes
description.html:
Try it out

From the root of the ign-gazebo directory, run:

ign-gazebo -v 4 -f test/worlds/mesh.sdf

It needs to be run from the root so that the mesh's relative path is correct.

Rendering

Since rendering right now is only used in the GUI, and outside of the ECS, all it needed was the mesh information on the scene message.

It needs this PR for collada materials to show up.

And this PR prevents crashes for invalid meshes.

Physics

Physics is the only consumer of mesh information from the ECS right now, so I'm just loading the mesh in the physics system as a placeholder, building on top of @scpeters's changes.

Issues

  • Mesh seems to be correctly created, but the ducks don't collide with the ground plane. I'll debug more tomorrow with the help of @azeey.

TODOs

  • Load mesh outside of physics so that it can be propagated to other systems via a component
  • Use ign-fuel-tools to load meshes

title: [WIP] Mesh support
